message.body: I'm waiting on Kevin to get ready for Cindy. But I haven't heard from him in a couple days. Have you seen him / talked to him about this?
Yup he's getting bitten and I prob would be too but I bought :
Oops I'll send pics later but little moats for my bed legs and I religiously redry my bed stuffs every night and my bed is in center of room, legs caselined up etc etc

He didn't mention Cindy tho but I did show him what I did to my bed to make it 'safe' Tho you have to be really careful never to touch it/sit on it unless it's immediately after hot shower etc and you're naked lol
OK. I was waiting for him to be ready for Cindy to come out but I haven't heard from him in a couple days.
So you prob won't hear from him but I'm guessing he's just not ready yet
Never thought about Vaseline. Does that prevent them from crawling up the legs of the bed?
Yes but you have to reapply daily
Bc once it gets dust on it , it's useless (even microscopic layer of dust
I also made homemade moats and those kinda worked too but the once I bought are better bc they catch em
Wow. That's really cool. Where did you buy them?
I just spoke with Cindy. She is off tomorrow & her truck is in the shop on Monday & she has a doctors appt on Tuesday so the earliest she can get there is Wednesday afternoon.
